client
Class MovieLister

java.lang.Object
  client.MovieLister

public class MovieLister
extends java.lang.Object

The client of the example. It defines methods that search movies on various data supports. This class is annotated ResearchLog so every call of its methods is logged.

Author:
Matthieu Clochard

Method Detail

setFinderFileSystem

@Inject
public void setFinderFileSystem(MovieFinder finderFileSystem)
The injection mutator for file system finder. Inject it using the correct qualifier.

Parameters:
finderFileSystem -

movieDirectedBy

public java.util.List<Movie> movieDirectedBy(java.lang.String director)
The default research by director method. Uses the default injected finder. Fires an event for each result of the request.

Parameters:
director - the director name whose movies are researched.
Returns:
all the movies of this director on the default data support as a List.

movieDirectedByInFileSystem

public java.util.List<Movie> movieDirectedByInFileSystem(java.lang.String director)
The file system research by director method. Uses the file system injected finder.

Parameters:
director - the director name whose movies are researched.
Returns:
all the movies of this director on the file system data support as a List.

movieDirectedByInDatabase

public java.util.List<Movie> movieDirectedByInDatabase(java.lang.String director)
The database research by director method. Uses the database injected finder.

Parameters:
director - the director name whose movies are researched.
Returns:
all the movies of this director on the database data support as a List.

movieDirectedByEverywhere

public java.util.List<Movie> movieDirectedByEverywhere(java.lang.String director)
The global research by director method. Uses all injected finder.

Parameters:
director - the director name whose movies are researched.
Returns:
all the movies of this director on any data support as a List.

movieDirectedByDynamic

public java.util.List<Movie> movieDirectedByDynamic(java.lang.String director)
The dynamic research by director method. Uses the dynamically injected finder. This finder is selected randomly between database and file system.

Parameters:
director - the director name whose movies are researched.
Returns:
all the movies of this director on any data support as a List.
